#version 450

layout(binding = 0)uniform sampler2D lightColorTexture;
layout(binding = 1)uniform sampler2D fontColorTexture;

layout(location = 0)out vec4 color;

in vec2 uv;
void main(){
	
	vec4 light_color = texture(lightColorTexture, uv);
	vec4 font_color = texture(fontColorTexture, uv);
	
	color = vec4(font_color + light_color);
}
